title: Leandro Oliveira (footballer)
text: Leandro Aparecido Padilha de Oliveira (born January 2, 1988 in <a href="Campo%20Grande">Campo Grande</a>), is a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="Esporte%20Clube%20Noroeste">Noroeste</a>.
